p: With rare exceptions, most PD patients with parkin mutations do not have Lewy bodies [ 98]. In iPSC-derived neurons from two parkin patients, increased accumulation of α-synuclein is seen in one patient with Lewy bodies, but not in the other patient without Lewy bodies [ 92]. In our study, there is no significant difference in α-synuclein protein levels in iPSC-derived midbrain DA neurons from two PD patients with parkin mutations and two normal subjects [ 91]. Increased levels of α-synuclein protein are observed in two other studies using iPSC-derived neurons from PD patients with parkin mutations [ 93, 99].
